```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("hexSticker")
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(hexSticker)
imgurl <- system.file("shipcapcrew.jpg")
```

```{r sticker}
sticker("shipcapcrew.jpg", package="shipcapcrew", 
        p_size=8, s_x=1, s_y=.8, s_width=0.5, s_height=.5, h_fill = "#97bfde",
        h_color = "#13106b", p_color = "#13106b",
        filename="hexsticker.png")
```
